result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Nikkita Green

records.addlTxt: Status conference on September 22, 2022 at 08:45 am.

2:32 PM Defendant Nikkita Green appeared by phone.  Attorney Shanna Sanders appeared by video for Nikkita Green.  Prosecuting attorney Kyle Edward Johnson appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defense stipulates to Defendants identity. Officer Michael Doran sworn in and testified by video. State moves for bind over, Defense objects. Court finds probable cause and binds Defendant over for filing of an Information. Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived. Defendants Attorney pleads not guilty and jury trial to be set. Bond continued.
Preliminary hearing on August 29, 2022 at 02:30 pm.

10:13 AM Prosecuting attorney Margaret Nan Ginocchio appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Nikkita Green appeared by video.  Attorney Shanna Sanders appeared by video for Nikkita Green. Preliminary hearing requested by zoom and set.
Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 29, 2022 at 02:30 pm.
Adjourned initial appearance on August 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.

10:26 AM Prosecuting attorney Noah M Tylenda appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Nikkita Green appeared by phone.  Attorney Shanna Sanders not in court. Matter continued to allow defendant to contact attorney. 
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for August 11, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Name doesn't match other open cases should be Judge Hanson
Adjourned initial appearance on July 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.

8:41 AM Prosecuting attorney Mason C Braunschweig appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Nikkita Green appeared by phone.  Attorney Shanna Sanders appeared by video for Nikkita Green. Defendant plans to hire private Attorney. Bond continued.
Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for July 28, 2022 at 10:00 am.
Preliminary hearing on July 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.
